attributes.action: George Osbourne MP to step down as Chancellor of the Exchequer
attributes.background: I come from an area in South Wales called Blaenau Gwent, and I feel that the cuts the chancellor is making, is affecting the working class, because families are struggling to pay the bills.  Mr Osbourne doesn't realise the choices he makes are damaging the working class in Blaenau Gwent.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
